Key Match Events: Juan Soto's tiebreaking three-run home run in the top of the 10th inning
Tim Hill rewarded manager Aaron Boone's faith by retiring Steven Kwan on an unassisted double play by Oswaldo Cabrera
Post-Match Reflections: Weaver said, 'It meant the world. It's a long time coming. The role I'm in, what I'm doing, amazing team, this is why I signed up to come back to revitalize and come back to a winning culture.'
Hill said, 'We all went out there with some heart, and got the job done.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees defeated the Guardians, 5-2 in 10 innings, in Game 5 of the ALCS
The trio of Tim Hill, Jake Cousins, and Luke Weaver combined for the final 14 outs
